title: WATCH LIVE | State capture inquiry to hear testimony on Eskom, The New Age
text:
WATCH LIVE | State capture inquiry to hear testimony on Eskom, The New Age

29 October, 10:20 AM

The state capture commission of inquiry is expected to resume on Tuesday with testimony related to The New Age newspaper.

Pieter Pretorius, the acting general manager of strategic marketing and branding at Eskom, is expected to take the stand at 10:00.

The commission is also expected to hear testimony from Chose Choeu, Eskom's former divisional executive for corporate affairs.

Stream courtesy of SABC.
description: The state capture commission of inquiry is expected to resume with testimony related to The New Age newspaper.
